Wow. Much thanks.

Fill this form before you go anywhere else!!!

We will email you with a follow up form and your tickets will be sent to the email you provided within 48-72 hours after completion, very manual, so doublecheck. If you have any issues or questions, join our riot.im chat and make sure to follow all our social media below.

  • Join our Dogecon Riot channel to ask the ops team any questions– we’re here, we’re real, and we’re working on processing your tickets in a timely fashion

  • Keep an eye on our Twitter for the media updates/celebrational/meme side of things

  • Check our Medium blog for official updates, backgrounders on the events we’ve planned, and calls to public action in preparation for this convention!
